db:abstract.db:para: Allows configuration of browser properties and attributes.
This type was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.1.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The WebEngineSettings type can be used to configure browser properties and generic attributes, such as JavaScript support, focus behavior, and access to remote content. This type is uncreatable, but the default settings for all web engine views can be accessed by using the WebEngine.settings property.
Each web engine view can have individual settings that can be accessed by using the WebEngineView.settings property.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 1.3] accelerated2dCanvasEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Specifies whether the HTML 5 2D canvas should be a OpenGL framebuffer. This makes many painting operations faster, but slows down pixel access.
Enabled by default if available.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.3.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 1.3] autoLoadIconsForPage : bool
db:section.db:para: Automatically downloads icons for web pages.
Enabled by default.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.3.

db:section.db:title: autoLoadImages : bool
db:section.db:para: Automatically loads images on web pages.
Enabled by default.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 1.2] defaultTextEncoding : string
db:section.db:para: Sets the default encoding. The value must be a string describing an encoding such as "utf-8" or "iso-8859-1".
If left empty, a default value will be used.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.2.

db:section.db:title: errorPageEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables displaying the built-in error pages of Chromium.
Enabled by default.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 1.2] fullscreenSupportEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Tells the web engine whether fullscreen is supported in this application or not.
Enabled by default.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.2.

db:section.db:title: hyperlinkAuditingEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables support for the ping attribute for hyperlinks.
Disabled by default.

db:section.db:title: javascriptCanAccessClipboard : bool
db:section.db:para: Allows JavaScript programs to read from or write to the clipboard.
Disabled by default.

db:section.db:title: javascriptCanOpenWindows : bool
db:section.db:para: Allows JavaScript programs to open popup windows without user interaction.
Enabled by default.

db:section.db:title: javascriptEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables the running of JavaScript programs.
Enabled by default.

db:section.db:title: linksIncludedInFocusChain : bool
db:section.db:para: Includes hyperlinks in the keyboard focus chain.
Enabled by default.

db:section.db:title: localContentCanAccessFileUrls : bool
db:section.db:para: Allows locally loaded documents to access other local URLs.
Enabled by default.

db:section.db:title: localContentCanAccessRemoteUrls : bool
db:section.db:para: Allows locally loaded documents to access remote URLs.
Disabled by default.

db:section.db:title: localStorageEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables support for the HTML 5 local storage feature.
Enabled by default.

db:section.db:title: pluginsEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables support for Pepper plugins, such as the Flash player.
Disabled by default.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 1.3] screenCaptureEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Tells the web engine whether screen capture is supported in this application or not.
Disabled by default.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.3.

db:section.db:title: spatialNavigationEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables the Spatial Navigation feature, which means the ability to navigate between focusable elements, such as hyperlinks and form controls, on a web page by using the Left, Right, Up and Down arrow keys.
For example, if a user presses the Right key, heuristics determine whether there is an element they might be trying to reach towards the right and which element they probably want.
Disabled by default.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 1.3] touchIconsEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables support for touch icons and precomposed touch icons.
Disabled by default.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.3.

db:section.db:title: [since QtWebEngine 1.3] webGLEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables support for HTML 5 WebGL.
Enabled by default if available.
This property was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.3.
